prefix: the prefix for this server is `%s`. You can change the prefix with `%s settings prefix`. For a list of all commands see `%s help`.
missingperm: 为执行此命令我缺少一些权限：
limit:
🚨 **停一下，你太快了！** 🚨

%s，你发出的指令过多了。
disclaimer:
I am a small bot with the task to link to Gamepedia and Fandom wikis. %s wrote me in JavaScript.

**I am not affiliated with Fandom and am an unofficial tool!**

You can support me on Patreon:
helpserver: 有问题吗？你可以访问我的专属支援伺服器：
patreon:
this is a Patreon only feature!
You can support me on Patreon to get access to this feature:

settings.save_failed: 啊喔，设置保存失败了，请稍后再试。
settings.missing: 这个伺服器尚未完成设置，使用 %1$s 以及 %2$s 来完成设置。
settings.current: these are the current settings for this server:
settings.channel current: these are the current settings for this channel:
settings.lang: the language for this server is:
settings.channel lang: the language for this channel is:
settings.langchanged: you changed the language for this server to:
settings.channel langchanged: you changed the language for this channel to:
settings.langhelp:
使用 `%s <language>` 修改语言。
目前支持的语言：
settings.wikiinvalid: please provide a valid link to a Gamepedia or Fandom wiki!
settings.wikihelp:
Use `%s <link>` to change the default wiki.
Link to the wiki: `https://<wiki>.gamepedia.com/` or `https://<wiki>.fandom.com/`
settings.prefix: the prefix for this server is:
settings.prefixinvalid: the specified prefix is not supported!
settings.prefixchanged: you changed the prefix for this server to:
settings.prefixhelp:
Use `%s <prefix>` to change the prefix.
The prefix may not include spaces or mentions!

inline enabled.inline: inline commands are currently enabled for this server.
inline enabled.channel inline: inline commands are currently enabled for this channel.
inline enabled.inlinechanged: you enabled inline commands for this server.
inline enabled.channel inlinechanged: you enabled inline commands for this channel.

inline disabled.inline: inline commands are currently disabled for this server.
inline disabled.channel inline: inline commands are currently disabled for this channel.
inline disabled.inlinechanged: you disabled inline commands for this server.
inline disabled.channel inlinechanged: you disabled inline commands for this channel.
inline disabled.help: Use `%1$s` to enable inline commands like `[[%2$s]]` and `{{%2$s}}`.

pause.off: 我已取消暂停，即将继续开始服务！

voice.disabled: you disabled the function to add roles for voice channels.

help.all: 想知道我能够干什么？让我来告诉你吧：
help.admin: 这些指令仅限管理员使用：
help.noadmin: 这个指令仅限拥有`管理员`权限的用户使用！
help.pause:
**我目前处于暂停状态！**
仅能使用以下指令：
help.footer: 如果你觉得我的某个信息刷屏，在信息上添加一个🗑️图标我就会自己删掉这一条信息。

list.desc: 我将返回一个wiki指定页面的链接
I will answer with a direct link to the article in the wiki.
I will answer with a link to the article in the wiki.
I will answer with a link to a matching article in the named Gamepedia wiki: `https://<wiki>.gamepedia.com/`
我将返回特定wiki的指定页面的链接: `https://<wiki>.fandom.com/`
我将返回特定的org域名下的wiki的指定页面的链接: `https://<wiki>.wikia.org/`
我将返回指定用户的信息
我将返回指定差异编号的比较页面链接
我将返回指定页面最后一次更改的比较页面链接
我将返回wiki上一个随机页面的链接
我将返回wiki上一个随机页面的链接
我将返回wiki的相关数据以及统计信息
I will answer with the syntax of the Minecraft command and a link to the article for the command in the Minecraft Wiki.
I will answer with the syntax of the Minecraft command and a link to the article for the command in the Minecraft Wiki.
I will answer with the syntax of the Minecraft command and a link to the article for the command in the Minecraft Wiki.
I will answer with a link to the bug in the Minecraft bug tracker.
我将返回指定wiki页面的链接
我将返回指定wiki页面的链接
我将返回wiki搜索结果的链接
我将返回wiki搜索结果的链接
I will answer with a link to a matching discussion thread in the Fandom wiki.
I will answer with a link to a matching discussion post in the Fandom wiki.
我将进行自我介绍
我将提供使用帮助
我将提供指该令的使用方法
我将提供所有的管理指令
我将提供所有的管理指令
我将修改设置参数
I will change the language for this server.
I will change the prefix for this server.
I will toggle inline commands for this server.
I will change the default wiki for this server.
I will change the overwrites for the current channel.
I try to give everyone in a voice channel a specific role.
我将屏蔽少数管理指令外的全部指令
我将重新接受全部指令
如果我被激活了，我就会回答你！否则不会。
